itunes:title: DOWN Homeschool HOLE, Part II
title: DOWN Homeschool HOLE, Part II
description:
It's Thursday.   We've almost made it through week two of homeschool and we're feeling a bit punchy.  Shaye's been working out and can barely move and Angela's fall allergies are trying to get the best of her, but we're not having it!   We want to have FUN and so, today we have a riot wrapping up Monday's conversation while trying to answer as many of your homeschool questions as possible.

CUE the WINE MUSIC!
Get your "penny bottle" now by visiting https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic
This is the part of the podcast where we encourage you to pour a glass of whatever scratches your itch, for us, that means a bottle of wine. Our wine segment is sponsored by Dry Farm Wines which is a fabulous online company that will ship you organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, no-garbage wines from all around the world. This is wine that is grown and bottled to help you tap into life and celebrate it!

American Blossom Linens  -  We LOVE our Modern Vintage Sheets!  Turn your bedroom into an organic, chic oasis by using the promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20, and get an exclusive 20% off discount just for listening to the show.

And now for some flavor!   Today's show is also brought to you by...
San Juan Island Sea Salt - order yours today!   Salts, rubs, herbs... all harvested using zero electricity! They are "more than just salt"  visit   Grab the Spicy Thai Blend!   https://www.sanjuanislandseasalt.com/home
